articles.author: James OlleySenior Writer, ESPN FC
articles.title: Everton reject Chelsea's £40m bid for Anthony Gordon - sources
articles.description: Chelsea have had a £40 million bid for Anthony Gordon rejected by Everton, sources have told ESPN.
articles.content:
Chelsea have had a £40 million bid for Anthony Gordon rejected by Everton, sources have told ESPN.

articles.title: Brittney Griner's defense team files appeal of conviction
articles.description: Brittney Griner's legal team had been expected to file an appeal of her conviction. The WNBA star was sentenced to nine years in a Russian prison for drug charges.
articles.content:
MOSCOW -- Lawyers for American basketball star Brittney Griner on Monday filed an appeal against her nine-year Russian prison sentence for drug possession, Russian news agencies reported.

articles.title: 'On account of a number of factors related to scheduling,' Serena Williams' opening match in Cincinnati pushed to Tuesday
articles.description: Serena Williams, 40, who is preparing to retire, will face 19-year-old Emma Raducanu, the defending U.S. Open champion in Cincinnati Tuesday instead of Monday due to "a number of factors related to scheduling," a Western & Southern Open spokesperson said.
articles.content:
MASON, Ohio -- Serena Williams' opening match in the Western & Southern Open has been rescheduled from Monday to Tuesday.
The 40-year-old Williams, preparing to retire, is set to face 19-year-ol… [+560 chars]

articles.description: Hours after representatives of the Houston Astros hosted members of the Uvalde community for a pregame event on Sunday, Alex Bregman delivered on one young fan's request for a home run.

articles.title: Will Zalatoris makes most of three-hole playoff to win FedEx St. Jude Championship in dramatic fashion
articles.description: Will Zalatoris, who had the most money and the best world ranking of anyone without a PGA Tour victory, won the FedEx St. Jude Championship without making birdie in a three-hole playoff on Sunday in Tennessee.
articles.content: MEMPHIS, Tenn. -- Will Zalatoris had the most money and the best world ranking of anyone without a PGA Tour victory. He changed that Sunday by winning the FedEx St. Jude Championship without making b… [+3786 chars]

articles.title: Albert Pujols homers twice to close in on Alex Rodriguez on career HR list, help St. Louis Cardinals beat Milwaukee Brewers
articles.description: Albert Pujols homered twice Sunday to reach 689 home runs and close in on Alex Rodriguez for third on the career home runs list.
articles.content:
ST. LOUIS -- Albert Pujols homered twice and Miles Mikolas tossed eight effective innings, helping the St. Louis Cardinals beat the Milwaukee Brewers 6-3 on Sunday.

articles.title: Legendary Texas Longhorns FB Steve Worster, inspiration for Wishbone offense, dies at 73
articles.description: Steve Worster, a bruising fullback who was the inspiration for the creation of the Wishbone offense at Texas, died on Saturday at 73.
articles.content: Steve Worster, a two-time All-American at Texas and the bruising fullback who was the inspiration for the creation of the Wishbone offense that came to dominate college football in the 1970s and '80s… [+4282 chars]

articles.title: Drew Rasmussen takes perfect game into ninth inning in Tampa Bay Rays' victory over Baltimore Orioles
articles.description: Drew Rasmussen took a perfect game into the ninth inning as the Rays prevailed over the Orioles 4-1 on Sunday.
